otherNames: LBX: Little Battlers eXperience Season 2, ダンボール戦機 Ｗ
synopsis:
Danball Senki tells the story of Yamano Ban and his friends, young boys who desire become an LBX Fighter, LBX is name of little robot figures.  But his mother don’t want this, because his father was be an accident relative with LBX years ago.
 
Danball Senki tells the story of Yamano Ban and his friends, young boys who desire become an LBX Fighter, LBX is name of little robot figures.  But his mother don’t want this, because his father was be an accident relative with LBX years ago.
One day, a secret women approaches him with a suitcase, when he open suitcase, immediately he find a strange new LBX Robot. Then Ban and his friend take part in corporation war that spreads all the way up to the highest political positions of power in Japan, and the true origins behind LBX Battling.
